summary: Quiets Those Loud annoying Horse Sounds
descriptionHtml:
If my horse blows his nose or spits and slobbers at me one more time I\'m going to screem. AHHHH!!! This mod will at least help quiet the horse so you don\'t know that it\'s happening. By the way, how deep of a hole do you think your horse can dig if you leave him in one spot. You need to download only 2 files. One of the Combat files (Only One) and One of the Idle files (Only One). You choose whether you want him quiet or muted. I play with the Combat Quiet and Idle Mute files.



[color=yellow]Check Out My Other Mods[/color]
